page.title: 19THE DARBY AND JOAN CLUB
page.content: The{Darby and Joan club}meets every Tuesday afternoon in the Village Hall There are 30 regular members. The entertainment for the afternoon includes card games, afternoon tea, bingo and a raffle. Baking for the tea is done by local volunteers. The club, run by mrs Ann Poslethwaite is in its 14th year.There is a commitee to plan events.In addition to the tuesday sessions the club runs three trips each year; this year to Conway, Leighton Hall and Hornsea Potteries. There are 2 Bring and Buy Sales each year to finance the{Christmas Party, } which is one of the highlights of the year.The members are treated to an excellent tea and entertainment, including a Carol Concert presented by the children of the Village School.
